name: ORS Hospital Movements
description: Details of past medical movements in and out of an establishment for a date range entered at runtime MOV0027 - v00.00.01 Last Modified: 17/10/11

dataset.name: Hospital Movements
dataset.query: dataset_base_ AS (SELECT AT_OFFENDER.OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY AS OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY, AT_OFFENDER.LAST_NAME AS LAST_NAME, AT_OFFENDER_EXTERNAL_MOVEMENTS.MOVEMENT_DATE AS MOVEMENT_DATE, AT_OFFENDER_EXTERNAL_MOVEMENTS.MOVEMENT_TIME AS MOVEMENT_TIME, AT_MOV_TYPE_DESC.CODE AS CODE, AT_OFFENDER_EXTERNAL_MOVEMENTS.DIRECTION_CODE AS DIRECTION_CODE, COALESCE(AT_EXT_MOV_FROM_AGY.DESCRIPTION, AT_FROM_CITY_CODES.DESCRIPTION, AT_FROM_ADDRESS_ATTENDED.STREET || ' ' || AT_FROM_ADDRESS_ATTENDED.LOCALITY || ' ' || AT_FROM_ADDRESS_ATTENDED.POSTAL_CODE) AS FROM_, COALESCE(AT_EXT_MOV_TO_AGY.DESCRIPTION, AT_TO_CITY_CODES.DESCRIPTION, AT_TO_ADDRESS_ATTENDED.STREET || ' ' || AT_TO_ADDRESS_ATTENDED.LOCALITY || ' ' || AT_TO_ADDRESS_ATTENDED.POSTAL_CODE) AS TO_, AT_OFFENDER_EXTERNAL_MOVEMENTS.COMMENT_TEXT AS COMMENT_TEXT, AT_OFFENDER_EXTERNAL_MOVEMENTS.ESCORT_CODE AS ESCORT_CODE FROM OMS_OWNER.OFFENDERS AT_OFFENDER, OMS_OWNER.REFERENCE_CODES AT_MOV_TYPE_DESC, OMS_OWNER.REFERENCE_CODES AT_FROM_CITY_CODES, OMS_OWNER.REFERENCE_CODES AT_TO_CITY_CODES, OMS_OWNER.OFFENDER_BOOKINGS AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING, OMS_OWNER.AGENCY_LOCATIONS AT_EXT_MOV_FROM_AGY, OMS_OWNER.AGENCY_LOCATIONS AT_EXT_MOV_TO_AGY, OMS_OWNER.AGENCY_LOCATIONS AT_MOV_LOC_TO_OFFND_LOCTION, OMS_OWNER.OFFENDER_EXTERNAL_MOVEMENTS AT_OFFENDER_EXTERNAL_MOVEMENTS, ADDRESSES AT_FROM_ADDRESS_ATTENDED, ADDRESSES AT_TO_ADDRESS_ATTENDED WHERE (AT_OFFENDER.OFFENDER_ID = AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_ID) AND (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_BOOK_ID = AT_OFFENDER_EXTERNAL_MOVEMENTS.OFFENDER_BOOK_ID (+)) AND (AT_MOV_TYPE_DESC.CODE (+) = AT_OFFENDER_EXTERNAL_MOVEMENTS.MOVEMENT_TYPE) AND (AT_MOV_TYPE_DESC.DOMAIN (+) = ('MOVE_TYPE')) AND (AT_OFFENDER_EXTERNAL_MOVEMENTS.TO_AGY_LOC_ID = AT_MOV_LOC_TO_OFFND_LOCTION.AGY_LOC_ID (+)) AND (AT_MOV_LOC_TO_OFFND_LOCTION.AGENCY_LOCATION_TYPE = 'INST') AND (AT_OFFENDER_EXTERNAL_MOVEMENTS.TO_AGY_LOC_ID = AT_EXT_MOV_TO_AGY.AGY_LOC_ID (+)) AND (AT_OFFENDER_EXTERNAL_MOVEMENTS.FROM_AGY_LOC_ID = AT_EXT_MOV_FROM_AGY.AGY_LOC_ID (+)) AND (AT_OFFENDER_EXTERNAL_MOVEMENTS.TO_CITY = AT_TO_CITY_CODES.CODE (+)) AND (AT_TO_CITY_CODES.DOMAIN = 'CITY' OR AT_TO_CITY_CODES.DOMAIN IS NULL) AND (AT_OFFENDER_EXTERNAL_MOVEMENTS.FROM_CITY = AT_FROM_CITY_CODES.CODE (+)) AND (AT_FROM_CITY_CODES.DOMAIN = 'CITY' OR AT_FROM_CITY_CODES.DOMAIN IS NULL) AND (AT_OFFENDER_EXTERNAL_MOVEMENTS.TO_ADDRESS_ID = AT_TO_ADDRESS_ATTENDED.ADDRESS_ID (+)) AND (AT_OFFENDER_EXTERNAL_MOVEMENTS.FROM_ADDRESS_ID = AT_FROM_ADDRESS_ATTENDED.ADDRESS_ID (+)) AND (AT_OFFENDER_EXTERNAL_MOVEMENTS.MOVEMENT_REASON_CODE IN ('C5', 'C6', 'MED', '5', 'HP') AND TRUNC(AT_OFFENDER_EXTERNAL_MOVEMENTS.MOVEMENT_DATE) BETWEEN (SELECT start_date FROM prompt_) AND (SELECT end_date FROM prompt_) AND TRUNC(AT_OFFENDER_EXTERNAL_MOVEMENTS.MOVEMENT_DATE) <= TRUNC(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP) AND AT_MOV_LOC_TO_OFFND_LOCTION.AGY_LOC_ID = (SELECT establishment_code FROM prompt_) AND AT_OFFENDER_EXTERNAL_MOVEMENTS.DIRECTION_CODE = 'IN') UNION SELECT AT_OFFENDER.OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY AS OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY, AT_OFFENDER.LAST_NAME AS LAST_NAME, AT_OFFENDER_EXTERNAL_MOVEMENTS.MOVEMENT_DATE AS MOVEMENT_DATE, AT_OFFENDER_EXTERNAL_MOVEMENTS.MOVEMENT_TIME AS MOVEMENT_TIME, AT_MOV_TYPE_DESC.CODE AS CODE, AT_OFFENDER_EXTERNAL_MOVEMENTS.DIRECTION_CODE AS DIRECTION_CODE, COALESCE(AT_EXT_MOV_FROM_AGY.DESCRIPTION, AT_FROM_CITY_CODES.DESCRIPTION, AT_FROM_ADDRESS_ATTENDED.STREET || ' ' || AT_FROM_ADDRESS_ATTENDED.LOCALITY || ' ' || AT_FROM_ADDRESS_ATTENDED.POSTAL_CODE) AS FROM_, COALESCE(AT_EXT_MOV_TO_AGY.DESCRIPTION, AT_TO_CITY_CODES.DESCRIPTION, AT_TO_ADDRESS_ATTENDED.STREET || ' ' || AT_TO_ADDRESS_ATTENDED.LOCALITY || ' ' || AT_TO_ADDRESS_ATTENDED.POSTAL_CODE) AS TO_, AT_OFFENDER_EXTERNAL_MOVEMENTS.COMMENT_TEXT AS COMMENT_TEXT, AT_OFFENDER_EXTERNAL_MOVEMENTS.ESCORT_CODE AS ESCORT_CODE FROM OMS_OWNER.OFFENDERS AT_OFFENDER, OMS_OWNER.REFERENCE_CODES AT_MOV_TYPE_DESC, OMS_OWNER.REFERENCE_CODES AT_FROM_CITY_CODES, OMS_OWNER.REFERENCE_CODES AT_TO_CITY_CODES, OMS_OWNER.OFFENDER_BOOKINGS AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING, OMS_OWNER.AGENCY_LOCATIONS AT_EXT_MOV_FROM_AGY, OMS_OWNER.AGENCY_LOCATIONS AT_EXT_MOV_TO_AGY, OMS_OWNER.AGENCY_LOCATIONS AT_MOV_LOC_FROM_OFFND_LOCTION, OMS_OWNER.OFFENDER_EXTERNAL_MOVEMENTS AT_OFFENDER_EXTERNAL_MOVEMENTS, ADDRESSES AT_FROM_ADDRESS_ATTENDED, ADDRESSES AT_TO_ADDRESS_ATTENDED WHERE (AT_OFFENDER.OFFENDER_ID = AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_ID) AND (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_BOOK_ID = AT_OFFENDER_EXTERNAL_MOVEMENTS.OFFENDER_BOOK_ID (+)) AND (AT_MOV_TYPE_DESC.CODE (+) = AT_OFFENDER_EXTERNAL_MOVEMENTS.MOVEMENT_TYPE) AND (AT_MOV_TYPE_DESC.DOMAIN (+) = ('MOVE_TYPE')) AND (AT_OFFENDER_EXTERNAL_MOVEMENTS.FROM_AGY_LOC_ID = AT_MOV_LOC_FROM_OFFND_LOCTION.AGY_LOC_ID (+)) AND (AT_MOV_LOC_FROM_OFFND_LOCTION.AGENCY_LOCATION_TYPE = 'INST') AND (AT_OFFENDER_EXTERNAL_MOVEMENTS.TO_AGY_LOC_ID = AT_EXT_MOV_TO_AGY.AGY_LOC_ID (+)) AND (AT_OFFENDER_EXTERNAL_MOVEMENTS.FROM_AGY_LOC_ID = AT_EXT_MOV_FROM_AGY.AGY_LOC_ID (+)) AND (AT_OFFENDER_EXTERNAL_MOVEMENTS.TO_CITY = AT_TO_CITY_CODES.CODE (+)) AND (AT_TO_CITY_CODES.DOMAIN = 'CITY' OR AT_TO_CITY_CODES.DOMAIN IS NULL) AND (AT_OFFENDER_EXTERNAL_MOVEMENTS.FROM_CITY = AT_FROM_CITY_CODES.CODE (+)) AND (AT_FROM_CITY_CODES.DOMAIN = 'CITY' OR AT_FROM_CITY_CODES.DOMAIN IS NULL) AND (AT_OFFENDER_EXTERNAL_MOVEMENTS.TO_ADDRESS_ID = AT_TO_ADDRESS_ATTENDED.ADDRESS_ID (+)) AND (AT_OFFENDER_EXTERNAL_MOVEMENTS.FROM_ADDRESS_ID = AT_FROM_ADDRESS_ATTENDED.ADDRESS_ID (+)) AND (AT_OFFENDER_EXTERNAL_MOVEMENTS.MOVEMENT_REASON_CODE IN ('C5', 'C6', 'MED', '5', 'HP') AND TRUNC(AT_OFFENDER_EXTERNAL_MOVEMENTS.MOVEMENT_DATE) BETWEEN (SELECT start_date FROM prompt_) AND (SELECT end_date FROM prompt_) AND TRUNC(AT_OFFENDER_EXTERNAL_MOVEMENTS.MOVEMENT_DATE) <= TRUNC(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP) AND AT_MOV_LOC_FROM_OFFND_LOCTION.AGY_LOC_ID = (SELECT establishment_code FROM prompt_) AND AT_OFFENDER_EXTERNAL_MOVEMENTS.DIRECTION_CODE = 'OUT')), dataset_ AS (SELECT OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY, LAST_NAME, MOVEMENT_DATE, MOVEMENT_TIME, CODE, DIRECTION_CODE, FROM_, TO_, COMMENT_TEXT, ESCORT_CODE FROM dataset_base_)

dataset.name: Total Admissions in and out
dataset.query: SELECT SUM(CASE WHEN LOWER(direction_code) = 'in' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as TOTAL_DIR_IN, SUM(CASE WHEN LOWER(direction_code) = 'out' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as TOTAL_DIR_OUT from ${tableId}
